items.sentence: Tom could do his job faster if he\'d let Mary help him.
It\'s very likely that somebody will be waiting for us.
I want to do what I used to do before I went to prison.
I want to get these things done as quickly as possible.
I want to stay home with you, but I have to work today.
We never would have allowed Tom to go there by himself.
We really thought Tom was going to stay for a few days.
Was Tom the one who told you that you ought to do that?
Tom seemed to always be ahead of the rest of the class.
Tom should have done it the way Mary told him to do it.
